title: The Sheriff's Son
features: This book was converted from its physical edition to the digital format by a community of volunteers. You may find it for free on the web. Purchase of the Kindle edition includes wireless delivery.
description: William MacLeod Raine (1871–1954) was a prolific writer of Western novels, some of which were adapted for the screen. In 1959, four years after his death, he was inducted into the Hall of Great Westerners of the National Cowboy and Western Heritage Museum.
